data.description:
Niftons Arena is a free multiplayer real-time strategy game for up to 4 players. Hundreds of little Niftons are pouring into the arena, and you have to build them paths and lead them safely through the chaos! But be alert - other players want your Niftons dead!

Whoever gets most of their Niftons to the exit wins the game.

This game is easy to learn, but hard to master. It can get very competitive, and if you like using logic thinking and strategizing, you will love this game.
It will test your wits, tactics, and quick thinking in virtual reality.
Make sure to start with the tutorial, which will teach you the basics. And then expect much more!

This isn't an ordinary path-building game. In the Niftons Arena, a match of skilled players is an adrenaline-infused journey.
Use clever strategies, deadly weapons and magic events to turn the tide of battle in your favor.
Only the most skilled player can navigate through the chaos, outsmart their opponents, and claim victory.

Team up with friends for an intense multiplayer battle, play against people you meet in the arena or start a singleplayer match against AI players. With every match offering a new challenge, it's a game you can enjoy again and again, watching your skills improve over time.
Get Niftons Arena today and prove you have what it takes to win!

Join our discord at niftons.com to get real-time notifications when other players enter the arena and find people to play with.

changelog.change_log: Added singleplayer! You can now add AI players when creating a match.

"BIG SOCIAL UPDATE!


Now you can walk inside the arena like you would in a real-life stadium and meet other players, create a match, spectate a game or just make new friends.

No more "create a game room" like in the 90's. Now it's much more social and easier to meet other players than ever before!

Read about other improvements and fixes inside the arena on the "what's new" board.
